attribute.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <data-import xmlns="http://www.efaps.org/xsd" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.efaps.org/xsd http://www.efaps.org/xsd/eFaps_1.0.xsd"> <definition name="ImportIDE" file="" skipLine="12" execute="false" update="true"> <identifier class="org.efaps.esjp.data.identifier.QueryIdentifier"> <property name="QueryAttribute">Number</property> <property name="QueryColumn">DOCNUMBER</property> </identifier> <type name="HumanResource_Employee"> <attribute name="Number" column="DOCNUMBER" validate="false"/> <attribute name="NumberTypeLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionDOIType</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Value</property> <property name="QueryColumn">DOCTYPE</property> </attribute> <attribute name="NationalityLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionNationality</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Description</property> <property name="QueryColumn">COUNTRY</property> </attribute>

<attribute name="SexLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionSex</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Value</property> <property name="QueryColumn">SEX</property> </attribute> <attribute name="LastName" column="LASTNAME1" validate="false" overwrite="true"/> <attribute name="SecondLastName" column="LASTNAME2" validate="false" overwrite="true"/> <attribute name="FirstName" column="FIRSTNAME" validate="false" overwrite="true"/> <attribute name="Status" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.StatusColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.StatusColumn"> <property name="StatusGrp">HumanResource_EmployeeStatus</property> <property name="Status">Worker</property> </attribute> <attribute name="BirthDate" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.DateColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.DateColumn" overwrite="true"> <property name="Column">BIRTHDATE</property> <property name="Pattern">dd/MM/yyyy</property> </attribute> </type> </definition> </data-import>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <data-import xmlns="http://www.efaps.org/xsd" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.efaps.org/xsd http://www.efaps.org/xsd/eFaps_1.0.xsd"> <definition name="ImportIDE" file="" skipLine="11" execute="true" update="true"> <identifier class="org.efaps.esjp.data.identifier.QueryIdentifier"> <property name="QueryAttribute">Number</property> <property name="QueryColumn">DOCNUMBER</property> </identifier> <type name="HumanResource_Employee"> <classification name="HumanResource_ClassTR_Health"> <attribute name="HealthRegimeLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" overwrite="true"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionHealthRegime</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Value</property> <property name="QueryColumn">HEALTHREGIME</property> </attribute> <attribute name="HealthStartDate" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.DateColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.DateColumn" overwrite="true"> <property name="Column">HDATE</property> <property name="Pattern">dd/MM/yyyy</property> </attribute>

<attribute name="PensionRegimeLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" overwrite="true"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionPensionRegime</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Value</property> <property name="QueryColumn">PENSIONREGIME</property> </attribute> <attribute name="PensionStartDate" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.DateColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.DateColumn" overwrite="true"> <property name="Column">PDATE</property> <property name="Pattern">dd/MM/yyyy</property> </attribute> <attribute name="CUSPP" column="CUSPP" validate="false" overwrite="true"/> </classification> </type> </definition> </data-import>
